short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A timer to track your progress for practice coding interview questions online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to track your progress to solve coding/technical interview questions. There is a timer (45 or 30 minutes for easy and medium questions) and a stage progression bar to indicate which problem solving stage you should be.
